response.overview: In her new stage as a mother, a confused Lety stops to think about her difficult pregnancy process. What should have been a simple daily task becomes a constant look back, in which she questions her freedom after being deprived of the power to take control of her body and decisions throughout her pregnancy. Now, Lety will be forced to live with the weight of having been involved in a continuous game by the medical staff, knowing that, unfortunately, the only option to find her peace of mind will be to let it go in the hope of seeing a better tomorrow with her child.
response.title: Lo pequeña que fui
